results.source_text: Tenant agrees to pay Landlord monthly rent in the amount of Two Thousand Three Hundred Dollars ($2,300.00), due on the first (1st) day of each calendar month.

results.source_text: If rent is not received by the fifth (5th) day of the month, Tenant shall pay a late fee of Ten Percent (10%) of the monthly rent amount, plus Five Dollars ($5.00) per day for each additional day the rent remains unpaid.
